107
Ear Ache
Pain in the ears occurs commonly in children. The common causes are:
✱  Cough and cold: The tube which connects the nose and the ear gets blocked 
when the child has a severe cold with blocked nose. He/she will complain 
of pain in the ears. A smaller infant may cry excessively and touch the ear. 
Sometimes pus comes out of the ear, which means that the child has an ear infection.  
✱  Wax in the ear may also cause ear ache.
What to do:If the infant or child has ear ache because of cough and cold, then:
✱ The condition should be managed with steam 
inhalation. Plenty of fluids along with a 
nutritious diet should be given to the child.
THE HEALTH WORKER SHOULD BE CONTACTED FOR:
✱ Medicines to treat the cough and cold.
✱ Medicines to treat the infection.
✱ NO DROPS OR OIL SHOULD BE PUT IN THE EAR
